The MEME Suite

Motif-based sequence analysis tools

log-hmm

Usage:

log-hmm [options] <HMM file>

Description

This program converts a HMM file generated by mhmm from probabilites to log probabilities.

Inputs

HMM file

A file containing the description of a HMM in mhmm format.

Outputs

The program prints to standard output the same HMM but with log probabilities rather then probabilities.

Options

Option Parameter Description Default Behaviour
General Options
